comment.author: 8262083@N02
comment._content: Good photo but I disagree with the title.  The Spit Bridge links Mosman and Seaforth, Manly is further down the road.

comment.author: 95027075@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/tyersall] I agree, definitely not in Manly. The picture is taken from Seaforth, so the title might be "The Spit Bridge viewed from Seaforth".

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
Yes, Seaforth would be more appropriate. I'll update the title.
-AG

comment._content: This image was uploaded here -- commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:The_Spit_Bridge,_Seaforth... Thanks for using a CC liscense that allows re-use!
